error.title: No secondary workfile
error.description:
## No secondary workfile found
Current process expects that primary workfile (for example with a extension '{extension}') will contain also 'secondary' workfile.
Secondary workfile for '{file_name}' wasn't found.
### How to repair?
Attach secondary workfile or disable this validator and Publish again.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
This process was implemented for a possible use case of first workfile coming from Mari, secondary workfile for textures from Substance. Publish should contain both if primary workfile is present.
